com.atakmap.android.hierarchy

Interface HierarchyStateListener


  • public interface HierarchyStateListener
    Overlay Manager event listener Use HierarchyListReceiver.registerListener(HierarchyStateListener) For list-specific events see HierarchyListStateListener

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onClosed(HierarchyListAdapter adapter)
      Overlay Manager has been closed
      void onCurrentListChanged(HierarchyListAdapter adapter, HierarchyListItem oldList, HierarchyListItem newList)
      The current on-screen list has been changed
      void onOpened(HierarchyListAdapter adapter)
      Overlay Manager has been opened
      void onVisible(HierarchyListAdapter adapter, boolean visible)
      Overlay Manager drop-down visibility state changed Tied to DropDown.OnStateListener#onDropDownVisible(boolean)

    • Method Detail

      • onOpened

        void onOpened(HierarchyListAdapter adapter)
        Overlay Manager has been opened

      • onClosed

      • onVisible

        void onVisible(HierarchyListAdapter adapter,
               boolean visible)
        Overlay Manager drop-down visibility state changed Tied to DropDown.OnStateListener#onDropDownVisible(boolean)
        Parameters:
        adapter - Overlay Manager adapter
        visible - True if visible

      • onCurrentListChanged

        void onCurrentListChanged(HierarchyListAdapter adapter,
                          HierarchyListItem oldList,
                          HierarchyListItem newList)
        The current on-screen list has been changed
        Parameters:
        adapter - Overlay Manager adapter
        oldList - The previous current list
        newList - The new current list
